title: Delightful Remodeled 1 Bedroom
posting_body: Call today to schedule a showing!
Owners are looking for excellent credit, Income 3x the monthly rent and no dogs.
Security Deposit is 1.5x the monthly rent

Delightful, light-filled One bedroon One bath in Noe Valley close to all major freeways, BART, and the J Church and walking distance from Noe Valley, Bernal Heights and Valencia Street Corridor restaurants, cafes and shopping .
Tastefully remodeled kitchen with large pantry.
Large bath with tile floors and large shower.
Large bedroom with closet and built in cabinet.
All utilities are included except for Cable and Internet!
96 Walk Score: Walker's Paradise, daily errands do not require a car
98 Bike Score: Daily errands can be accomplished on a bike
27 minutes to Downtown via public transport
5 minute walk to shops and restaurants
5 minute walk to Noe Rec Center & Plaground
